title: Heavy Handed Low Priority
body: So today my LoL freezes then the server keeps crashing and wont let me back into the game. 7 minutes later (im on skype with friends in the game) the game ends and it finally lets me into the post game lobby and i get given a 20 minute low priority queue. this is the first game ive left since the end of last season and ive been playing 2 or 3 games a day so thats a few hundred games in a row that i havent left or afked at all in. so why do i get given low priority for this? this is pretty unreasonable and tbh the game and community is at a state that sometimes its not even worth waiting the 20 min. is there anything that i, or riot, can do to fix this? its pretty bs and totally heavy handed to dish out punishments like that when its not even my fault that the server wouldnt let me back in at all. is anyone else having this over the top lp queue punishment thing happening to them?
